ygData.subject: Re: Verant's business sense
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, if this were the case, Enchanters would be on the end of the list to balance .  There are what, all of 3 enchanters over 35 on all servers?  One did hit
ygData.messageBody:
Well, if this were the case, Enchanters would be on the end of the list to
"balance". There are what, all of 3 enchanters over 35 on all servers? One
did hit 50, but if you look at his hours played, that was an extra-ordinary
effort.

If there is logic behind the "tweaking" that enchanters have undergone, the
only one I can think of is they dont want to implement actual enchanting, so
they are letting the class die off.


-----Original Message-----
From: jcent@... [mailto:jcent@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 10:56 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Verant's business sense


From: jcent@...


has anyone considered the possibility that Verant is 'balancing the
races/classes' in order to slow us from leveling? By 'us' I mean all
classes, not just enchanters. As some people are now approaching the
level cap (50) and may soon stop playing. (once a goal is reached so as
leveling....although the cap will be raised with the expansion, I have
read. The longer we play, the more money they get from us for monthly
services.

just a thought...

Fistlebane
